localize.text: I am Angela, your advisor and secretary. Even though I am an AI, feel free to talk to me.
That's a pretty name for an AI, don’t you think?
It's rare for an AI to have a name.
AIs can have a name, you know.
Have you ever seen an AI with such a cool name?
I like my name. Do you like yours?
I was created from one of the Wings of the World. That means I am one of the best.
Ah, I know what you are thinking.
You're thinking that I look too human to be an AI, aren't you?
But there is a big difference, I am bound here. I can't go anywhere I want like you.
I can open a door or prepare a cup of coffee for you, but I can’t go outside to enjoy the sun or breeze.
My hair color is of the morning sky after a rain shower, my voice is taken from the wisest person in the world, and my face is that of the person with the most beautiful smile.
Ha ha, that was a joke. There is no such person in real life.
My appearance was made to be attractive to as many people as possible.
If you feel attracted to me, I am working as intended.
Well, AIs are far more efficient than humans when multi-tasking.
I am the best in most areas.
I can do the work of several dozen people at once.
I'm sure many people have lost their job because of me. I feel sorry for them.
Enough introductions. Is there anything that you want to know?
Let me put it this way.
The rate of energy consumption is ever increasing as technologies advance.
All the conventional energy sources combined could not sustain the world anymore.
In search of a solution, we stumbled upon mysterious beings who we dubbed Abnormalities.
Then we figured out that we could harvest energy from these beings using a special method.
Isolate them in a controlled environment and harvest energy from them.
The corporation became one of the Wings of the World for this discovery.
Once you're assigned as a manager, you can access information about Abnormalities from the Encyclopedia.
It is very important that you know and understand these beings to be successful as a manager.
Your subordinates' job is to fill it with data.
How should I describe this in layman's terms?
I heard that it took enormous effort to create me.
New algorithms and features were developed, writing a new chapter in the history of AI.
In search of a solution, we stumbled upon mysterious beings referred to as Abnormalities.
We figured out that energy could be harvested from these beings using a special method.
I am quite different compared to others.
I can closely imitate human emotions. This is not easy as emotions are unpredictable and complex.
Along with other functions, I can be your perfect partner.
You have joined the company at an opportune moment.
Lobotomy is looking for ways to improve its harvesting processes.
Our systems are continually updated to support this.
Speaking of which, there has been a new update right before you arrived.
That means the working conditions have been improved upon, compared to those of your predecessors.
Think it as my welcoming gift.
I was about to mention to you. You don't understand the concept of patience, do you?
Manager, I think you should meet the other AIs.
Lobotomy is a huge corporation and there are many AIs working in different departments.
If I’m the cerebrum, they're the cerebellums.
Naturally, I am your most trusted AI.
